scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Crucifixion of Christ, with Jesus on the cross, his body draped in a blue cloth. Below him, a group of mourners, including figures in blue and pink robes, are gathered. To the right, soldiers in armor are present, one holding a shield with a red dragon emblem. The background is a decorative pattern of gold diamonds on a grey field. The overall impression is one of solemnity and sorrow.
